original_text: When he first arrived in Antioch, Peter had been eating meals with the Gentile believers there. Then James sent some Jewish believers from Jerusalem to Antioch. After those men had arrived, Peter started to keep himself separate from the Gentiles. He stopped eating meals with them. He was afraid of those Jews who wanted to circumcise the Gentile believers.
korean_text: 야고보에게서 온 어떤 이들이 이르기 전에 게바가 이방인과 함께 먹다가 그들이 오매 그가 할례자들을 두려워하여 떠나 물러가매

sentences.original_text: When he first arrived in Antioch,
Then James sent some Jewish believers
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 야고보는 몇몇 유대인 신자들을 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: Peter started to keep himself separate
He stopped eating meals with them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들과 함께 식사하는 것을 중단했습니다.

sentences.original_text: who wanted to circumcise the Gentile believers.
